description: Capela will be re-evaluated in a week, according to Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN.
Williams did not play in Tuesday's game (Apr. 19).
Williams had surgery on his left knee and is expected to return in 4-6 weeks, according to Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN.

The Bulls announced that Ball won't return this season.
